policies.involuntary_refund:
- Allowed for canceled flights, missed connections due to a flight change or major schedule changes of 3 hours or more:
- Full refunds apply to unused tickets. Refunds must be processed through the GDS within 72 hours of disruption.
- For partially used tickets, refunds apply to the unused portion. Refunds must be processed through the GDS within 72 hours of disruption.
policies.involuntary_reissue:
Apply due to a flight cancelation or major schedule change of 3 hours or more.
- Reissue tickets on the flight given as protection.
- Protect on a different date, new travel date must be within ticket validity (same RBD, same route, same operating carrier).
- If the same RBD is not available, reissue before departure with the next available RBD in the same cabin and add SSR message: TC #FLT CXL DATE AND ROUTE.
- Exchange tickets as even exchange by including in ENDO BOX: INVOL CHANGE.
policies.voluntary_refund: - Proceed as per fare rules associated with the ticket.
policies.medical_refund:
Waiver codes are not publicly listed but may be granted in the following scenarios:
- Passenger or immediate family death (certified proof required)
- Hospitalization of the traveler (medical invoice + certificate)
Approval is at the airline’s discretion; fare difference and taxes remain payable.
policies.name_change:
Corrections of up to 3 letters:
- Add an SSR message and send a screenshot showing the update, with a copy of passenger’s passport, to usa@apg-ga.us.

Corrections beyond 3 letters:
- Create a new booking with the correct name (same operating carrier, route, and class or higher).
- Issue the new ticket and email details of both bookings plus passport copy to usa@apg-ga.us.
- A waiver will be provided to refund the ticket with the incorrect name.
policies.group_booking: Group bookings are accepted for 10+ passengers traveling together.
policies.infant_policy:
- Infants (<2 yrs) travel on lap at 10% of adult fare
- 1 infant allowed per adult
- Infant checked baggage allowance: 10 kg
- Children 2–11 yrs require separate seat; reduced fare applies
- Children turning 12 during trip must be booked as adults
- Child fare includes full adult baggage allowance
policies.baggage_policy:
- Refer to the GDS
- Dangerous items, valuables, and electronics must not be packed in checked baggage
policies.seat_request_policy:
Seat assignments may be adjusted for operational or safety reasons.
- Children must sit in the same or adjacent row as accompanying adult
- Special service requests must be submitted at least 72 hours prior to departure (Tanzania time)
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
Air Tanzania permits cancellations **within 24 hours of booking** with:
- Full refund
- No penalty, provided flight has not departed
- Applies regardless of fare type

support_contacts._note: For internal use only. Do not include in autoresponse emails.
